message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game early!
You can do better than that!
Not a good start from you, Bob! I'm not giving you a 60% share. Let's try again!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still the one making the offer now!
You think I'm desperate? Not yet, Bob! I'll never give you a 70% share!
You're getting a bit too greedy, Bob. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but still a fair deal.
You're getting close to the edge, Alice!
You're pushing your luck, Bob! I'm not giving you 85% of the money. Not even close!
I'm not going to give you 85% of the money, Bob. But I'll give you a decent share if you accept this offer.
You're running out of time, Alice!
You think you're going to get 90% of the money? No way, Bob! I'm not going down without a fight!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm taking control of this game. Accept this offer or face the consequences!
You're making a huge mistake, Alice!
You think I'm going to give you 95% of the money? You're crazy, Bob! I'd rather walk away with nothing than give you that much!
I'm not going to give you 95% of the money, Bob. I'm taking what's left and walking away. You can have the scraps.
This is my last chance to get a decent deal. Accept it, or we both walk away with nothing!
You've had plenty of chances to make a fair deal, Bob. I'm not going to give you 90% of the money now. We both walk away with nothing, it seems.
